div.p: Fig. S1 Relationship between variance explained by each chromosome for maternal, morphological and personality traits in the NL and UK populations.
Fig. S2 (a–h) QTL scans for the quantitative traits in the NL (orange) and UK (blue) populations.
Fig. S3 (a–g) Null distribution of correlations between QTL LOD scores between the UK and NL for each trait.
Fig. S4 (a–h) GWAS plots for the quantitative traits in the NL and UK populations.
Fig. S5 Plots of estimated effect size for each SNP in the UK and NL populations.
